import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import HeaderBar from "@components/header" import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import { observer, inject } from "mobx-react" import { queryActivityTypes } from "./request" import "./style.scss" const Transform = (props: any) => { const { goBack } = useHistory(); const { homeState } = props; const [transData, setTransData] = useState({}); const { data } = homeState const change = (e: any, key: string) => { setTransData({ ...transData, [key]: e.target.value }) } const submit = () => { } return (

{data.coinAmount}

Q币余额

转账金额 { change(e, "transferAmount") }} />

对方账号 { change(e, "receiverLoginName") }} />

对方姓名 { change(e, "receiverName") }} />

登陆密码 { change(e, "loginPwd") }} />

Q币将转入对方账号无法退款

确定转账

) } export default inject('homeState')((observer(Transform)));
